WorkflowInfo.Name: Backup and zip folder
WorkflowInfo.Description: Backup and zip the log folder on list of servers
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:GetDate;Assembly=GetDate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:FolderCopy;Assembly=FolderCopy, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ZipCompress;Assembly=ZipCompress, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="1" TableName="ServersList" RowNumber="4" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="ServerName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server1</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server2</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server3</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>192.168.1.1</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%ServersList%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%ServersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="ServersList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns4:GetDate IsValid="True" x:Name="getDate1" TimeInterval="Minutes" FuturePast="0" DateFormat="MM_dd_yyyy_HH_mm" TypeName="GetDate" TimeZoneName="(UTC+01:00) Amsterdam, Berlin, Bern, Rome, Stockholm, Vienna" TimeZone="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Returns the date in the specified format." DisplayName="Get Date" TimeZoneIsInDaylightSavingTime="True" TimeToAdd="0" /> <ns5:FolderCopy SrcPassword="" DstHostName="localhost" DisplayName="Copy Folder" IsValid="True" DstPassword="" TypeName="FolderCopy" DstPath="D:\Logs_%getDate1%" Description="Copy a folder from a source location to a destination location" SrcHostName="localhost" x:Name="folderCopy1" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcPath="c:\Logs" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DstUserName="" SubFolders="1" SrcUserName="" /> <ns6:ZipCompress SrcPassword="" TimeInSeconds="0" DstHostName="localhost" HostName="localhost" DisplayName="Zip Compression" IsValid="True" HostId="1" x:Name="zipCompress1" TypeName="ZipCompress" DstPath="D:\Logs_%getDate1%.zip" SrcHostName="localhost" EncryptionType="Standard" DstPassword="" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcPath="D:\Logs_%getDate1%" ArchivePassword="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a Zip Compressed file with the specified compression type." DstUserName="" isPasswordEnabled="0" ZipCompressionLevel="Super Fast" SrcUserName="" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
